content: have a picky male in your life this hat is the product of many trial and error knit hats for my hubby give it a whirl and rest easy knowing you ve found **the one** **note about beanie length** my dave doesn t like hats that completely cover his ears i told you he was picky so in the pattern i start the decreases at 5 5 from the cast on edge if you think your recipient would prefer covered lobes just continue in the round until 6-6 25 from the cast on edge before starting the decrease rounds for the top *** **slouchy version** slouch hats are all the rage especially for the younger dave s in your life here are the modifications to make a slouchy dave cast on 88 sts and work in k2 p2 or k1 p1 using us 7s for 1 75 stay with the 88sts but switch to us 8s and knit every round until hat measures 8 5 from cast on edge work dave beanie decreases for crown hat measures a wee bit over 10 s from cast on to the very top- measured flat
